1290670.name: Freedom! Do or Die
1290670.description:
When terrorism threatens the world there is no need to send a bunch of iconic movie heroes back from the '80s. One under-funded over-powered mercenary is all that's needed to save the world in this epic run 'n' gun destruction-fest of a homage to Broforce!

  • Shoot, grenade and bludgeon your way through dozens of big and varied levels.
  • Each level is built almost entirely from destructible terrain, allowing you to carve or blast your own path however you wish. Strategically choose a good path or gravity will punish you as you plummet to your doom!
  • Do not think you can escape the enemies by climbing ladders. They can climb them too and hunt you down!
  • Engage in tough epic Boss Fights that will really test your mettle!
1290670.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
